#include <iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
            string s[22];
            int s1[22];
            for(int k=0;k<22;k++)
                s1[k]=0;
            int n,i=0;
            cin>>n;
            while(i<n)
            {
                cin>>s[i];
                i++;
            }
            i=1;
            while(i<=n)
            {
                int j;
                for(j=0;s[i-1][j]!='\0';j++)
                {
                    if(s[i-1][j]=='a'||s[i-1][j]=='A')
                        s1[i]=s1[i]+1;
                    else if(s[i-1][j]=='e'||s[i-1][j]=='E')
                        s1[i]=s1[i]+5;
                     else if(s[i-1][j]=='i'||s[i-1][j]=='I')
                        s1[i]=s1[i]+9;
                     else if(s[i-1][j]=='o'||s[i-1][j]=='O')
                        s1[i]=s1[i]+15;
                     else if(s[i-1][j]=='u'||s[i-1][j]=='U')
                        s1[i]=s1[i]+21;

                }
                i++;
            }
            i=1;
            int t;
            for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            {
                t=i;
                int j;
                for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
                {
                    if(j<t&&s1[t]==s1[j])
                        t=j;
                    else if(s1[t]<s1[j])
                         t=j;
                }
                cout<<s[t-1]<<endl;
                s1[t]=-999;
                //s2[k]=t-1;
                //k++;
            }
            //for(k=0;k<n;k++)
              //  cout<<s[s2[k]]<<endl;

    }
   	return 0;
}
